name: Tellus the Little Angel
text: If this card is sent from the Monster Zone to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Tellus Wing Token" (Fairy/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). If you control "Tellus Wing Token": You can banish this card from your GY and 1 Spell from your hand; Special Summon 2 "Tellus Wing Tokens", also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except from the hand. You can only use each effect of "Tellus the Little Angel" once per turn.
